column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////What else is there to say that others' haven't already said? Nothing! The staff is friendly
column3: and patient (lots of groups eat here
column4: and probably have a hard time deciding between all of the dishes).  Tried the paella for the first time - wow that is a huge dish. For 2 people
column6: and maybe 1-2 other small things.  We ordered 5 small plates
column7: and paella (which takes a while to make)
column8: and took most of the paella home.  Heated up as leftovers a few days later
column9: it was still really good! Come here with your family
column14: whatever.  There will be at least a few things on the menu that each person in your party will enjoy.
